document.full_text: the dollar floundered at three-year lows against a basket of currencies on friday, keeping precious metals near record highs, although the risk of dealers covering bets against the beleaguered u.s. currency in thin trading looms, especially given holidays in some centers including japan.
document.title: ailing dollar boosts demand for commodities, credit
lines_and_colors: the dollar floundered at three-year lows against a basket of currencies on friday, keeping precious metals near record highs, although the risk of dealers covering bets against the beleaguered u.s. currency in thin trading looms, especially given holidays in some centers including japan.
